data.title: Experience At the Movies at Life.Church
data.meta_description: Learn all about At the Movies and find a service time at a Life.Church location near you.
data.text:
During At the Movies, we’ll watch scenes from powerful movies in church, and Pastor Craig Groeschel will use them to teach us more about God, ourselves, and the life that’s possible for us.

And our Life.Church locations go all out—transforming the lobbies into movie sets from your favorite movies and creating photo ops and other fun for your family!

Walk into one of our movies sets and enjoy a fully immersive, fun experience that everyone in your family will love—including your kids.

You can even pre-register your family to make your LifeKids check-in as smooth as possible!
